snippet: Though the graveyard of journalism is littered with popular science magazines, a new one, Nautilus, emerges with the goal of being “a New Yorker version of Scientific American.”
abstract: Popular science magazine Natilus: Science Connected explores single topic per issue through combined thinking of scientists, philosophers and religious leaders; publication faces daunting odds of success in era of dwindling magazine and newspaper subscriptions that has been particularly hard on science journalism.
lead_paragraph: Though the graveyard of journalism is littered with popular science magazines, a new one, Nautilus, emerges with the goal of being “a New Yorker version of Scientific American.”

headline.print_headline: A Magazine or a Living Fossil?
headline.seo: A Glossy Science Magazine or Living Fossil?
headline.main: A Magazine or a Living Fossil?
